translations: 最整洁的（neat 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: That would be the neatest solution.
sentences.translation: 那将是最好的解决办法。

sentences.sentence: Don't try to make our house the neatest in the neighborhood.
sentences.translation: 不要强求把我们的房子弄成全社区最干净的。

sentences.sentence: Researches on CG of fish have been one of the neatest focuses in nutrient physiology of aquatic animals.
sentences.translation: 鱼类补偿生长的研究现已成为水产动物营养生理学的研究热点之一。
